sentences.en: Clearly there is some chicanery going on.
Some think more legal chicanery may be in store.
sentences.cn: 有人认为,或许以后还有更高明的法律骗局.

sentences.en: The seven - page memo a gun in the unfolding investigation of alleged financial chicanery at Enron.
sentences.cn: 七页的备忘录成为安然公司财务调查中不可辩驳的证据.

sentences.en: The world is full of chicanery.
They experienced adolescence, developed powerful mother - and - child bonds and used political chicanery to get what they wanted.
sentences.cn: 他们经历青春期, 有紧密的母子关系,为了得到想要的东西耍狡猾的花招.

sentences.en: We will continue to see such chicanery in the future.
sentences.cn: 在往后的日子我们仍将看到这样的骗局持续上演.

sentences.en: Well - doer never does chicanery and person who is good at chicanery does not belong well - doer.
sentences.cn: 善良的人从不狡辩,狡辩的人一定不是善良之辈.

sentences.en: Why are you give me so much chicanery as a explanation?
sentences.cn: 你为什么给我那么多狡辩的解释?

trans.tran_cn: 耍花招哄骗别人（尤指于法律事务中），不诚实的行为，欺骗
trans.tran_en: the use of clever plans or actions to deceive people
